vibesExplanation:
The selected workout video primarily aligns with 'The Warrior Workout' vibe due to its focus on high-intensity, full-body exercises using moderately heavy dumbbells. The description emphasizes building strength and muscular definition through sequences like the Arnold press and Romanian deadlift, which are known to invoke a sense of vigorous, primal energy typical of Warrior workouts. The 20-minute format with limited rest and no repeats challenges endurance and strength, warranting a score of 0.7.

'Progression Quest' is also fitting, scoring 0.6, as the routine encourages methodical improvement and strength gains. Users report repeated engagement over weeks to achieve visible results, which supports a structured, incremental development approach reminiscent of a progression vibe.

Finally, 'The Masterclass Workout' receives a moderate score of 0.5 due to the focus on technique-driven exercises, like the Pallof press, and offering modifications, which adds an element of skill refinement and education, typical of a masterclass setting.

The choice to exclude vibes like 'The Zen Flow' was due to the session's emphasis on intensity and strength, which do not match the calm and unhurried nature of a Zen-centered workout.
